vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.40;
son of: Bela (H1106A);
brother of: Ard (H0714H), Ezbon (H0675H), Uzzi (H5813I), Uzziel (H5816I), Jerimoth (H3406), Iri (H5901), Addar (H0146H), Gera (H1617I), Abihud (H0031), Abishua (H0050H) and Ahoah (H0265); also called Naamite at Num.26.40;
Group of na.a.man (נַעֲמָן "Naaman" H5283H)
§ Naamites = see Naamah "loveliness"
the descendants of Naaman, the grandson of Benjamin
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Naamán; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
乃幔族 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 乃幔 "愉悅"
便雅憫之孫乃幔的後裔(民 26:40)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
乃幔族 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 见 乃幔 "愉悦"
便雅悯之孙乃幔的后裔(民 26:40)
